an3.79:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.79:2.1: “Tinimani, bhante, gandhajatani, yesam anuvatamyeva gandho gacchati, no pativatam.
an3.79:2.4: imani kho, bhante, tini gandhajatani, yesam anuvatamyeva gandho gacchati, no pativatam.
an3.79:2.5: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kinci gandhajatam yassa anuvatampi gandho gacchati, pativatampi gandho gacchati, anuvatapativatampi gandho gacchati”ti?
an3.79:3.1: “Atthananda, kinci gandhajatam yassa anuvatampi gandho gacchati, pativatampi gandho gacchati, anuvatapativatampi gandho gacchati”ti.
an3.79:3.2: “Katamanca pana, bhante, gandhajatam yassa anuvatampi gandho gacchati, pativatampi gandho gacchati, anuvatapativatampi gandho gacchati”ti?
an3.79:4.1: “Idhananda, yasmim game va nigame va itthi va puriso va buddham saranam gato hoti, dhammam saranam gato hoti, sangham saranam gato hoti,
an3.79:4.2: panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti, silava hoti kalyanadhammo,
an3.79:4.3: vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato.
an3.79:5.2: ‘amukasmim nama game va nigame va itthi va puriso va buddham saranam gato hoti, dhammam saranam gato hoti, sangham saranam gato hoti,
an3.79:5.3: panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti, silava hoti kalyanadhammo,
an3.79:5.4: vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato’ti.
an3.79:6.2: ‘amukasmim nama game va nigame va itthi va puriso va buddham saranam gato hoti, dhammam saranam gato hoti, sangham saranam gato hoti,
an3.79:6.3: panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti, silava hoti kalyanadhammo,
an3.79:6.4: vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato’ti.
an3.79:6.5: Idam kho tam, ananda, gandhajatam yassa anuvatampi gandho gacchati, pativatampi gandho gacchati, anuvatapativatampi gandho gacchatiti.
